arabicText: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Eat	and	drink	with	pleasure,	a	reward	for	
what	you	used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Khāo	aur	piyo	khush-gawāri	se	sila	apne	
a’amāl	ka

arabicText: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مَّصْفُوفَةٍۢ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Reclining	on	thrones,	in	rows;	and	We	
have	wedded	them	to	maidens	with	
gorgeous	eyes.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Takhtoñ	par	takiya	lagāye	jo	qitār	laga	kar	
bichhe	haiñ	aur	hum	ne	unheiñ	biyah	diya	
badi	āñkhoñ	wāli	Hooroñ	se.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	accepted	faith,	and	whose	
descendants	followed	them	with	faith	-	
We	have	joined	their	descendants	with	
them,	and	have	not	reduced	anything	for	
them	from	their	deeds;	every	soul	is	
trapped	in	its	own	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	unki	aulād	ne	imān	ke	
sāth	unki	pairwi	ki	hum	ne	unki	aulād	un	se	
mila	di	aur	unke	‘amal	meiñ	unheiñ	kuchh	
kami	na	di	sab	āadmi	apne	kiye	meiñ	giriftār	
haiñ

englishTranslationText:
And	We	aided	them	with	fruit	and	meat,	
whatever	they	desire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	unki	madad	farmāyi	mewe	aur	
gosht	se	jo	chāheñ

arabicText: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا لَّا لَغْوٌۭ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
In	it,	they	accept	cups	from	each	other,	in	
which	is	neither	any	lewdness	nor	any	sin.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ek	doosre	se	lete	haiñ	woh	jām	jis	meiñ	na	
behoodgi	aur	na	guneh	gāri

arabicText: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌۭ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	their	boy	servants	shall	go	around	
them,	as	if	they	were	pearls,	safely	hidden.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unke	khidmat-gār	ladke	unke	gird	
phireñ	ge	goya	woh	moti	haiñ	chupa	kar	
rakhe	gaye

englishTranslationText:
And	one	of	them	turned	towards	the	
other,	questioning.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	ek	ne	doosre	ki	taraf	moñh	
kiya	poochte	huwe

arabicText: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
englishTranslationText: Saying,	“Indeed	before	this,	we	were	in	our	houses,	worried.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Bole	be-shak		hum	is	se	pehle	apne	gharoñ	meiñ	sehme	huwe	they

arabicText: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
englishTranslationText: “So	Allah	did	us	a	great	favour,	and	saved	us	from	the	punishment	of	the	flame.”
romanUrduTranslationText: To	Allah	ne	hum	par	ehsān	kiya	aur	hameiñ	loo	ke	‘aƶāb		se	bacha	liya

arabicText: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed	we	used	to	worship	Him	in	our	previous	life;	indeed	He	only	is	the	Benign,	the	Most	
Merciful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	hum	ne	apni	pehli	zindagi	meiñ	uski	ibadat	ki	thi	be-shak	wohi	ehsān	farmāne	wāla	
maherbān	hai
